Literary.small_text: You enjoy reading, writing, and expressing ideas through language.
Literary.big_text: Words are your world. You think, feel, and communicate best through reading and writing.

Artistic.small_text: You love expressing yourself through creativity, design, or performance.
Artistic.big_text: Your imagination is your superpower. You see the world differently—and beautifully.

Physical.small_text: You enjoy movement, action, and working with your body.
Physical.big_text: You're full of energy. Whether it's sports, dance, or outdoor work—you feel alive in motion.

Experimenting.small_text: You love trying, testing, and discovering new things.
Experimenting.big_text: You're a natural problem-solver who thrives on curiosity. You learn by doing.

Organizational.small_text: You enjoy planning, managing, and keeping things in order.
Organizational.big_text: Structure is your strength. You love turning chaos into clarity.

Business.small_text: You love planning, leading, and turning ideas into action.
Business.big_text: You think like a leader. You act like a builder. You're on your way to making big things happen.

Social.small_text: You enjoy helping, supporting, and being around people.
Social.big_text: You're a connector and a helper. People feel seen and supported by you.

Computational.small_text: You enjoy working with numbers, logic, and systems.
Computational.big_text: You love solving puzzles and finding patterns. You're wired for data and precision.

Persuasive.small_text: You’re great at influencing people and selling ideas.
Persuasive.big_text: You're confident, convincing, and charismatic. You know how to move people.

Investigative.small_text: You’re curious and love digging deep to uncover the truth.
Investigative.big_text: You're a seeker of facts and insights. You love solving mysteries with logic.

Practical / Hands-on.small_text: You prefer doing over talking, and love working with tools or machines.
Practical / Hands-on.big_text: You build, fix, and create with your hands. You bring ideas into the real world.
